Comment: Colonizes the lower gut of animals, and, as a facultative anaerobe. Maintained as a laboratory strain with minimal genetic manipulation, having only been cured of the temperate bacteriophage lambda and F plasmid by ultraviolet light and acridine orange, respectively.
Lineage: Bacteria; Proteobacteria; Gammaproteobacteria; Enterobacterales; Enterobacteriaceae; Escherichia

Reference.Title: The complete genome sequence of Escherichia coli K-12.
